attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: stop the common practise of foreign articulated lorries from using uk roads, whilst displaying different number plates on the front of their vehicles, to ones on the rear of their trailers.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
